title: Sleeping.Dogs.Definitive.Edition.Update.1.and.Crack-3DM
description:
There was a software issue where the HD World textures did not display correctly for some players, which resulted in lower detail textures being shown. This caused some players to feel that the Definitive Edition textures were inferior to the HD texture pack of the original Sleeping Dogs

Fixes HD textures not being activated in some cases.

1. Copy Update files in main install folder
2. Copy Crack in the main install folder
